mapper.select: select u.username userName, u.password password, r.name role, p.name resources from sys_user u left join sys_role_user ru on u.id=ru.sys_user_id left join sys_role r on ru.sys_role_id =r.id left join sys_permission_role pr on pr.role_id=r.id left join sys_permission p on p.id=pr.permission_id where u.id=#{userId}
